response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique features and benefits. Given its worth to you, we believe it could be a perfect fit for your needs. We kindly invite you to consider this opportunity and discuss how we can make this product an integral part of your endeavors. Should you choose to proceed, we assure you of our commitment to providing unparalleled service and support. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
